Reviews.Title: “Value for your money”
Reviews.Author: Paulus_Vanhanen
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel layover istanbul bangkok hotel close airport 10 min shuttle bus ride quiet neighborhood little tourist attractions nearby shopping centers kilometers hotel cosy standards comfortable breakfast included delicious price definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Awesome but not for touring”
Reviews.Author: Platna
Reviews.Content: booked air boss turkish airlines stopover purposes hotel absolutely amazing shuttle 10 minutes airport guy front desk nice spoke excellent english checkin breeze spotless newly renovated comfortable bed bathroom clean shower water pressure temperature times travelling hotel situation hill view surrounding neighborhood window wakeup call time flight earlier breakfast air boss packed breakfast bologna cheese sandwich juice box considerate 1 star location quiet neighborhood safe theres absolutely purposes hotel excellent base exploring istanbul

Reviews.Title: “It depends on the room you get”
Reviews.Author: Angelelis
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice january 2012 time stayed paid double 1st floor clean internet pretty fast lobby 1 floor noise reception heard time night time stayed due flight cancellation airline supposed travel hotel wasnt lucky 1st time stayed single floor reception cold noise reception heard impossible internet lobby lobby cold winter door kept closing hand staff helpful breakfast
